name: afire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly US or literary burning; on fire: The protesters set buildings afire. As the sun set, the sky seemed afire.
literary very brightly lit: The street was afire with neon signs.
literary feeling or showing very strong excitement, anger, etc.: Her book set the literary world afire. Young people were afire with the desire for change.
